files.patch:
@@ -1,10 +0,0 @@
-name: "Validate Gradle Wrapper"
-on: [push, pull_request]
-
-jobs:
-  validation:
-    name: "Validation"
-    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
-    steps:
-      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
-      - uses: gradle/wrapper-validation-action@v1

@@ -50,0 +50,8 @@
+  validation:
+    name: "Gradle Wrapper Validation"
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    steps:
+      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
+      - uses: gradle/wrapper-validation-action@v1
+
+
@@ -52,0 +60,1 @@
+    needs: validation
@@ -53,1 +62,0 @@
-    if: 'true'
@@ -134,0 +142,1 @@
+    needs: validation
@@ -135,1 +144,0 @@
-    if: 'true'
@@ -215,0 +223,1 @@
+    needs: validation
@@ -216,1 +225,0 @@
-    if: 'true'
